ReactGrid allows you to create custom data grids inside your ReactJS application while providing
a spreadsheet-like look and feel. Supported
Introduction The only requirement in order to make ReactGrid work is an installed ReactJS library. 1. Install ReactGrid from npm repository
In this part you will learn about common features and example implementations of ReactGrid features. Hangling changes Column resizing Column

In this chapter you will know about simplest and advanced ReactGrid components styling using Sass variables. Basic styling Custom Styling
Introduction For the correct display of the component it's required to import the basic styles contained in the  /dist  directory of
ReactGrid let you to style all key components using Sass variables.  To override default styles of ReactGrid you have to assign new values
ReactGrid uses expanded set of variables you can override. Color related variables Colors variables Shadow variables Context menu variables

ReactGrid public API contains interfaces, types and functions exported from  ReactGrid  package to compose grids,
defining custom behaviour
ReactGrid API provides following interfaces: Interfaces ReactGridProps CellChange Column Row Cell CellTemplate CellLocation MenuOption
ReactGrid component has three essential properties which you must pass in props to render -  columns ,  rows  and  license . Definition
CellChange  interface is used by  onCellsChanged  callback in  ReactGrid  component.  Definition TCell  is type that extends common  Cell
Row interface contains two necessary properties:  rowId  and  cells . Definition Properties Property name Type Property description rowId Id
This interface represents column in grid.  Column  interface contains only one necessary property:  columnId . Definition Properties
Cell  interface is a basis for built-in cell templates and your own, it has only one necessary prop -  type . Definition Properties

CellTemplate  is an interface used the communication between ReactGrid and a cell. See example  implementation .
At this moment if you are
CellLocation  is an interface that describes focus position inside grid. Definition Properties Property name Type Property description rowId
CellStyle  interface prevents passing unwanted CSS properties that could broke down grid rendering. Definition Properties Property name Type
Context menu is part of grid, each menu option must implement interface below.  Definition Properties Property name Type Property
ReactGrid API provides following types: Id Compatible Uncertain UncertainCompatible DropPosition
CompatibleCell  is an extended and exchangeable cell (compatible between different types).  Definition Properties Property name Type

Uncertain  is a cel type that every field of  TCell  optional. 
Cell of this type will have only one essential field provided by  Cell

UncertainCompatible  is a cell type that is compatible beetwen other cell types, 
but they can be intances of various types (e.g.  DataCell
Id  is a common type to identify many objects in grid e.g.:  Highlight ,  CellLocation ,   CellChange ,   Column ,  Row Id  can be an
Indicates where row/column was dropped. Used by  ReactGridProps  callbacks. Definition
